items.text: skips down the track to push this to long-on for another single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flighted on the stumps, he stays in his crease and plays it into the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: nicely tossed up just outside off, Bravo tries to steer it away but can't get it past point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.preText: Shuvo Shafiqur : "@Siam: Please wait until we have the same problem with t20's and test team as well. Thank you and hang in there. "
items.text: length ball angling slightly across him from round the stumps, opens the face to glide it to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: beaten stays inside the line, he probably thought that was the off-cutter but it fizzed through. Just past the outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: too full, half-volley on the pads and picked off nicely off his legs through midwicket. Mahmudullah gives chase and pulls it in, inside the boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 3 runs

items.text: now strays in line to the right-hander, back of a length on leg stump and tickled off his hips down to fine leg for a much-needed boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: batsman was almost in two minds on what shot to play there. Length ball angling across a tad, he looked like he wanted to drive it, but realised it wasn't full enough, ended up steering it towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he stands tall and punches through cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.preText: Mortaza is coming into the attack. His 200th ODI, can he make it special?
items.text: smashed it over cover. Too full, Bravo didn't try to really get to the pitch of the ball, but got enough bat on it to clear cover and send it to the cover fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, FOUR runs

items.text: went for the big straight drive but only toe-ends it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: good length outside off, and he shoulders arms to this one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: beaten straightened a touch after pitching, making it go past the outside edge. Bravo prodded at it thinking it would come in with the angle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: well outside off and he lets this go through. Safe because it was inside the tram-lines, so not a wide
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller length, keeps it in that channel just inside the tram-lines and Bravo lets it go through again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.preText: Suva: "I do not get why WI is sticking to Darren Bravo, he was and will never be an ODI player. A career ODI strike rate of mid 60 in these days just not enough. He is suited for test matches." - he does bring in some much-needed experience though. Apart from Samuels and Roach, nobody else in this team has played even 50 ODIs
items.text: very full, almost yorker length on off stump, but not quite nailing the yorker. He stays on the back foot and drives it to mid-off for a quick single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: dropped Ariful Haque at backward point puts down a fairly straightforward chance. Short outside off and he slashed at it, went straight to the fielder, popped in and out of his hands. Life for Bravo
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: tapped to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller length, steered to point off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: short ball outside off, played down to cover. Stayed in his crease and patted it down
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: swing and a miss good length in the channel outside off. Went for a cut with feet static, fortunately for him, he didn't get an edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, no run

items.text: strays on the pads, and flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, defended back
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: kept low again and it's pinged Rahim on a length outside off, it scooted through to the keeper, under Bravo's flailing bat. Nipped back in too, and Rahim cops it on his knee
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: now that one bounces up from a length and Bravo has to take his left hand off the bat handle to keep it down
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run
